name: Provincial Motor Vehicles (Amendment) Act, 2013
tagline: An Act to amend the Provincial Motor Vehicles Ordinance, 1965
content:
PROVINCIAL MOTOR VEHICLES (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2013  
ACT NO. IX OF 2013  
 
An Act further to amend the Provincial Motor Vehicles Ordinance, 1965  
WHEREAS  it is expedient further to amend the Provincial Motor Vehicles 
Ordinance, 1965 (W.P. Ordinance XIX of 1965), i n its application to the Islamabad 
Capital Territory, for the purpose hereinafter appearing;  
It is hereby enacted as follows: — 
1.  Short title and commencement. —(1) This Act may be called the Provincial 
Motor Vehicles (Amendment) Act, 2013.  
(2)  It shall c ome into force at once.  
2.  Amendment of Section 116 -A, W.P. Ordinance XIX of 1965. —In the 
Provincial Motor Vehicles Ordinance, 1965 (W.P. Ordinance XIX of 1965), as in force in 
the Islamabad Capital Territory, in Section 116 -A, after sub -section (5), the following 
new sub -section (6) shall be inserted, namely: -- 
"(6)     The Federal Government may, by notification in the official Gazette, 
amend provisions of the Twelfth Schedule so as to add any entry thereto, 
modify and entry therein or omit any entry the refrom".  
 
 
_______
